title: Treeline: you will be missed
body:
I just want to say that the upcoming removal of Twisted Tree line is saddening to me. I’m sure I’m not alone in this feeling. Treeline has been fun for me from the start. I wish we could change Riot’s mind about canceling yet another beloved game mode. If anyone wants to share their grief about losing Treeline or if you just want to share things you enjoyed about it, this is the thread. Here are some things I’ll miss about Treeline:
1) Vilemaw- aka the best buff in the game
2) The unique altar system
3) Smaller teams
4) Much less toxicity
5) Abusing bots to get chests for champs that I’m not good with
6) Awesome Treeline items like Wooglet’s Witchcap and Lord Van Dam’s Pillager
7) Short matches
8) The map itself

That's just... not true. The original Twisted Treeline was an odd map that felt like it was created just to have another game mode and even in season 1 wasn't too well known. The second Twisted Treeline got the same amount if attention as SR for exactly one patch: the patch it released on. After that it was left out in the woods to die with only a few changes over the entire lifetime of the mode.

I understand where you're coming from with this. The statement "No one played it" just isn't true though. Yes, 3v3 has always been MUCH smaller than 5s. However, I have played 3s since Season 1 and at one point exclusively played it. And it sucks that it's gone. It does matter.

It's true that twisted treeline was on life support, but they should stop saying it was difficult to maintain since they didn't touch it for years.
I ended up voting "No" because, at this point, Twisted treeline needs to go, because Riot will never give it attention anyways, and if people forced them too, they would make it a disaster.

Honestly, the only thing I'll miss is the team size. I always have 2 friends online and we've had so much fun playing Twisted Treeline over the past few years.

The team size allows for different compositions to succeed - Tanks are a bit stronger since you don't have 5 opponents whittling him down.

I won't miss the map all that much though. Nor will I miss the weird items .. err I take that back, Moonflair Spellblade was amazing.
